alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Conecuh; Escambia; Mobile Inland; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 11:52AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Monroe, northeastern Mobile, northwestern Baldwin, western Escambia and southern Conecuh Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1151 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Uriah to near Stockton. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atmore, Stockton, McCullough, Castleberry, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 113, I65 And AL 21 and Poarch Creek Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Inland; Conecuh; Escambia; Mobile Inland; Monroe
